card.name: Swarmyard
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Regenerate target Insect, Rat, Spider, or Squirrel. (The next time it would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Urza's Factory
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {7}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Assembly-Worker artifact creature token.

card.name: Vesuva
card.property: You may have Vesuva enter the battlefield tapped as a copy of any land on the battlefield.
